original: intros p. unfold is_gcd. split. - unfold divides. exists p. reflexivity. - split. + apply divides_0. + intros k Hk1 Hk2. apply Nat.le_le_trans with (n:=0). * apply Nat.le_0_l. * apply Nat.le_le_trans with (n:=k). -- apply divides_1_inv in Hk1. rewrite Hk1. apply Nat.le_refl. -- apply divides_1_inv in Hk2. rewrite Hk2. apply Nat.le_refl.
